properties.name: feign.hystrix.enabled
properties.description: If true, an OpenFeign client will be wrapped with a Hystrix circuit breaker.

properties.name: feign.autoconfiguration.jackson.enabled
properties.description: If true, PageJacksonModule and SortJacksonModule bean will be provided for Jackson page decoding.

properties.name: feign.circuitbreaker.enabled
properties.description: If true, an OpenFeign client will be wrapped with a Spring Cloud CircuitBreaker circuit breaker.

properties.name: feign.httpclient.enabled
properties.description: Enables the use of the Apache HTTP Client by Feign.

properties.name: feign.httpclient.hc5.enabled
properties.description: Enables the use of the Apache HTTP Client 5 by Feign.

properties.name: feign.okhttp.enabled
properties.description: Enables the use of the OK HTTP Client by Feign.

properties.name: feign.compression.response.enabled
properties.description: Enables the response from Feign to be compressed.

properties.name: feign.compression.response.useGzipDecoder
properties.description: Enables the default gzip decoder to be used.

properties.name: feign.compression.request.enabled
properties.description: Enables the request sent by Feign to be compressed.
